Ravulizumab Clinical Trial Program in PNH Overview: All advisors (academic and large community practice) were familiar with the 301/302 52-week data and indicated that nearly all their patients have switched to ravulizumab. Therefore, the discussion was not a direct reaction to the 52 week data presented, but more around current ravulizumab utilization in the real world setting and identify
